entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations bug when creating stored procedure with GOTO statement #32457
  • Add extension methods to turn relational nulls on/of for an individual LINQ query #32453
  • Computed column incorrectly created as nullable #32451

Closed

  • DBContext.Database.SqlQuery<string>(sql) get a wrong result #32435
  • Missing ConfigureAwait(false) for ToListAsync and related async terminating operators #32449
    9.0.0
  • Exception thrown when using IEnumberable<T>.First() inside of IEnumberable<T>.Contains() and IQueryable<T>.Where() #32442
  • Vulnerable package with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 8.0.0 #32441
  • Redundant JOIN in simple Where for one-to-many association #32419
  • [EF Core 6] EFCore.SqlServer uses EOL version of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient #32395
  • Issues when using EF with tables that have PK Identity(int.MinValue, 1) with MS SQL #32391
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite how to prevent all the runtime binaries from being emitted? #32382
  • [EF Core 8] Many-to-many relationship with payload #32381
  • DbContext Scaffold : The specified deps.json does not exist #32358
  • One or more errors occurred. (Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper dynamic-method) #32318
  • EntityFrameworkCore 6.0.24 and 7.0.13 fails Scaffolding for data objects that have two primary keys as the Primary Clustered Key #32271
  • Migrations for default configurations are generated in wrong order #32264
  • SQL SERVER varchar(max) 字符串长度在 4000到8000之间，字符串内容包含中文。EF CORE 保存报错: 数据类型 0xA7 的数据长度或元数据长度无效 #32238
  • migrationBuilder.UpdateData() translates TimeOnly to wrong time in SQL (AM/PM Issue) #32229
  • Busting stale data in DB entities (L1 cache and other sheningans) #32438
  • Alias validation code throws false positive for subquery referenced multiple times in the tree #32455
  • Wrong conversion of List of Enum with explicit conversion #32447
  • My DTOs without DBSet declaration in DB Context class, are still generating separate tables. #32426
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal table migration when altering computed column not generating correct script #27844
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32456
  • [release/8.0] Allow empty inline collections (#32414) #32454
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32448
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) on await foreach #32450
  • Switch to HashSet in LazyLoader #32445
  • Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32444
  • Fix to #27844 - EF Core 6.0 temporal table migration when altering computed column not generating correct script #32398

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-approved
  • Allow ignored key values for fixup before saving using TPT #32439
  • [release/8.0] Add method postfix when rewriting parameters for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32440
    Servicing-approved
